<MonsterBuffTypes xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
	<BuffType BuffName="-Template-">
		<BuffID>0</BuffID>
		<Attack>bool</Attack>
		<Duration>0</Duration>
		<MagicDamage>0</MagicDamage>
		<MeleeDamage>0</MeleeDamage>
		<MagicDefense>0</MagicDefense>
		<MeleeDefense>0</MeleeDefense>
		<KingdomOnly>Which</KingdomOnly>
		<DoTDamage>0</DoTDamage>
		<DoTTickLength>0</DoTTickLength>
		<Effect>Stunned</Effect>
		<RageCostChange>0</RageCostChange>
		<SpeedChange>0</SpeedChange>
		<AggroChange>0</AggroChange>
		<StackCount>0</StackCount>
		<RemoveOnDamage>bool</RemoveOnDamage>
		<RangedOverride>-powername-</RangedOverride>
		<MeleeOverride>-powername-</MeleeOverride>
		<BuffLoc>Head</BuffLoc>
		<EntTint>0xffffff</EntTint>
		<BuffIcon>-iconname-</BuffIcon>
		<GfxType>
			<AnimScale>1</AnimScale>
			<AnimFile>-file.swf-</AnimFile>
			<AnimClass>-classname-</AnimClass>
			<Tint>-tint-</Tint>
		</GfxType>
	</BuffType>

<TooltipTypes>
	<Tip name="am_GoMap">Map (M)</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_GoMe">Inventory (I)</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_GoMissions">Quest Log (L)</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_GoSocial">Social (O)</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_GoMenu">Options (ESC)</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_GoPremium">Join Dungeon Blitz as a Premium Member</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Whisper">Begin a message in your chat box below that will go just to this teammate</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Promote">Make this teammate the party leader</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Teleport">Teleport to this member of the party</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Remove">Kick this teammate from the party</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Invite">Invite this person to your party</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Examine">Look at the gear this person is wearing</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_MissionExit">Travel back out of this mission back to the door you entered</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Respawn">Stand back up with this much health</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Class_Paladin">Paladins can take a blow, heal friends, and smash whole groups of badguys at once.</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Class_Mage">Mages can hit hard from anywhere and do well at dealing with groups.</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Class_Rogue">Rogues hit hard, move fast, and confound badguys with misdirection and entanglement.</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_AddFriend">Invite this player to be your friend.</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_AddFriendButton">Invite a player to be your friend.</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_AddIgnoreButton">Accept no more messages from a player.</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_HPBar">Your current health</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_ManaBar">Your current rage. You need rage to use your powers</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_XPBar">When this bar is full, you level up</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_GoldArea">Gold you have</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_Channels">Current Chat Channel</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_ChannelLocal">Speak to players nearby</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_ChannelGroup">Speak to teammates in your party</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_ChannelGuild">Speak to the players in your guild</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_ChatOptions">Chat Options</Tip>
	<Tip name="am_ChatBox"/>
	<Tip name="am_ChatEntry">Chat    shortcut:    Hit [Enter] to begin              Hit [Enter] to send</Tip>
	<Tip name="NewCharPremiumReact">REACT$You must first unlock more character slots in the in-game store.</Tip>
</TooltipTypes>
